item.title: Production ready tutorial
item.description: This is an example of how you can use multiple tools in combination with Kahoy to obtain a production ready deployment workflow. Check kahoy-helm-example

item.title: Deploying to multiple envs
item.description: Check Production ready tutorial. It deploys to multiple envs (production and staging).

item.title: Git provider
item.description: Check Kustomize tutorial. It uses Kahoy Git provider as the storage.

item.title: Gitops production ready flow
item.description: Check Production ready tutorial. It deploys using Github actions, based on a git repository.

item.title: Helm templating
item.description: Check Production ready tutorial. It Uses Helm as the template engine to render multiple apps based on a single generic app chart.

item.title: Kubernetes provider
item.description: Check Production ready tutorial. It uses Kahoy kubernetes provider.

item.title: Kutomize templating
item.description: Check kahoy-kustomize-example. It uses Kahoy to render applications and deploy using Kahoy and git storage.

item.title: Waiting deployment to be ready
item.description: Check Production ready tutorial. It has a last stage after the deployments that will use Kahoy report to wait for the deployed resources to be ready (or deleted).
